name: financial-access-initiative
title: Financial Access Initiative
subtitle: A website for a major non-profit
synopsis:
The Drupal-based website, now replaced, for this Bill and Melina Dates sponsored non-profit allowed contributors to publish blog posts and academic papers. This data was then overlayead with a custom complex taxonomy called "Big Questions".

I worked on back and front end extensively for this site while also largely designing the user interface.
